oai_dc:dc.dc:title: United Confederate Veteran Reunion buttons and badges
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: These buttons and badges all date to the post-Civil War era and are associated with the United Confederate Veterans organization. The UCV was the largest Confederte veterans organization and they held annual reunions. The reunion buttons include meetings in Louisville, Ky., Memphis, Tenn., Nashville, Tenn., and Marshall, Mo. There is also a brass UCV badge from the 1911 Memphis Reunion and a ladder badge from the 1925 reunion in Dallas, Tx.
